answers.answer: P.S. I dont feel the pins and needles when I walk or think about them

Hi there!Well, without a detailed clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms. Possibilities that may need to be considered include stress/ anxiety, hormonal/ endocrine abnormalities, dry skin, infection, inflammation, allergy, insect bites, fungal infection, dermatitis, allergies, hives, scabies, liver diseases causing jaundice, renal diseases, metabolic disorders etc. Without a clinical evaluation it would be difficult to differentiate between the causes or suggest a treatment plan. I would suggest getting this evaluated by a primary care physician or a dermatologist for an accurate diagnosis and appropriate management.Hope this is useful.Take care!

question: Hi, im 15(healthy, slim, sporty) with severe anxiety.I can feel tiny itching sensations on my skin practicly everywhere(from toes to Head) on both sides...these itches can be felt all over my body(even on my skull etc.-everywhere). I have to scratch so it can go away. Is this parasthesia or Itching. IS THIS MS, I AM AFRAID OF MS-My grandfather had MS-but that does not make me a risk factor(only if I had a parent, brother or sister or aunt/uncle and i do not) I am male, live in Slovenia(South-Eastern Europe) have brown eyes, pale skin1 hour ago - 4 days left to answer.Additional DetailsI have severe anxiety....once i thought i have diabetes and got all the symptoms.Thirst, dry mouth, frequent urination.....and my BS was checked and was normal...and no other dissease was found.I got MS worries in January aswell because of a muscle cramp and got parasthesia or something then but went away in a day1 hour agoBefore the symptoms(one week) i had a doctors exam where i had a blood test done-NORMAL :)1 hour agoIve having these symptoms since wednsday after my foot got numb and after that i got an anxiety attack.....helpThis discussion is related to/posts/Neurology/Pain-behind-my-ear/show/1241768.
title: Pins and Needles in a 15 year old
